name: Compiler-cse340
tagline: A basic compiler which creates intermediate code from source code
body:
# Welcome to [Rajesh's](http://www.rajeshsurana.com) Compiler wiki!

This compiler is a result of course CSE340 project. It is completely error free and robust! Let's start checking it now! This is the compiler for Java like language. It almost covers all the constructs. In the [Parser Requirement](https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/blob/master/assignment%2002.pdf) document you can check out the supported constructs. You first need to make sure that JDK is installed on your machine. Then, download the .jar from [here](https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/blob/master/Compiler.jar) by clicking on the 'view raw'. 

GUI of this compiler is divided into 4 sections-
## 1.Lexer
Requirement and specifications can be found [here.](https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler/blob/master/assignment%2001.pdf) 
Here is the snapshot of Lexer-![Lexer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/master/Images/Lexer.jpg)
## 2.Parser
Requirement and specifications can be found [here.](https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler/blob/master/assignment%2002.pdf) 
Snapshot of Parser-![Parser](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/master/Images/Parser.jpg)
## 3.Semantic Analyzer
Requirement and specifications can be found [here.](https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler/blob/master/assignment%2003.pdf)
Snapshot of Semantic Analyzer-![Semantic Analyzer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/master/Images/SemanticAnalyzer.jpg)
## 4.Code Generator
Requirement and specifications can be found [here.] (https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler/blob/master/assignment%2004.pdf) To execute the output of the code generator paste the output in the Virtual machine which can be downloaded from [here](https://github.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/blob/master/VM340(6).jar).
Snapshot of Code Generator-![Code Generator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/Compiler-CSE340/master/Images/CodeGenerator.jpg)

***
Note:All problem statements are provided by the course instructor (Prof. Gonzalez-Sanchez, Javier).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
